alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 6:30PM CDT until June 03 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Central Collin County * WHEN...Until 930 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Plano, McKinney, Frisco, Allen, Prosper, Anna, Fairview, Princeton, Celina, Lucas, Melissa, Farmersville, Lowry Crossing, Blue Ridge, New Hope, Weston, Altoga, Lavon Lake, Westminster and Frognot.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
